posts.post_title: T206 Tannehill Tolstoi SOLD Thank you!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Merry Xmas everyone! 

I am selling a nice Lee Tannehill (No L) T206 with a Tolstoi back.  $55 shipped and insured.  Paypal, check or money order.

Thanks!
